abilities.title: Reborn in Blood
abilities.description: Each time you make a Blessings of Khorne roll, if this model is destroyed, you can use a triple 6 from that roll to use this ability. If you do, this model is no longer destroyed and is placed into Reserves with its full wounds remaining.

abilities.title: Wrathful Presence
abilities.description: At the start of your Charge phase, select one Wrathful Presence ability (see left). Until the start of your next Charge phase, this model has that ability.

choices.title: Glorious Bloodletting (Aura)
choices.description: While a friendly WORLD EATERS unit is within " of this model, each time a Charge roll is made for that unit, add 1 to the roll.

choices.title: Infectious Rage (Aura)
choices.description: While a friendly WORLD EATERS unit that is below its Starting Strength is within 6" of this model, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit. For the purposes of this ability, if a unit has a Starting Strength of 1, it is considered to be below its Starting Strength while it has lost one or more wounds.

choices.title: Righteous Slaughter (Aura)
choices.description: While a friendly WORLD EATERS unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

other.title: Supreme Commander
other.description: If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.
